title: axGear VGA to AV RCA Composite Converter Adapter Box with Audio PC to TV
features: This VGA to AV Audio converter is designed to convert a variety of computer images, from 640x480 up to 1920x1080, to interlaced NTSC or PAL video
Support high resolution PC input up to SXGA(1920x1080@60Hz).
Automatically detects and converts the incoming PC images to NTSC, PAL
description: VGA to AV RCA Composite Converter

This VGA to AV Audio converter is designed to convert a variety of computer images, from 640x480 up to 1920x1080, to interlaced NTSC or PAL video. It offers a composite output format. It is ideal for use in applications like video conference, home theatre, business presentation, lecturing room or viewing PC image on TV.

Automatically detects and converts the incoming PC images to NTSC, PAL. Support high resolution PC input up to SXGA(1920x1080@60Hz). Support resolution: 640x480 60 fps;800x600 60 fps , 75 fps;1024x768 60 fps, 75 fps 1280x720 60 fps;1280x768 60 fps, 75 fps;1280x1024 60 fps, 75 fps; 1360x768 60 fps;1400x1050 60 fps;1440x900 60 fps; 1680x1050 60 fps;1600x1200 60 fps;1920x1080 60 fps;

Frequency Bandwidth 165MHz Input Port 1 x VGA, 1 x Audio Jack Output Port 1 x AV Power Supply USB power (Not included) ESD Protection Human Body Model:  ± 8kV (air-gap discharge) ± 4kV (contact discharge) Operating Temperature 0°C ~ 40°C / 32°F ~ 104°F Storage Temperature -20°C ~ 60°C / -4°F ~ 140°F Relative Humidity 20 ~ 90% RH (Non-condensing) Power Consumption (Max) 2.5W (Max)

The converter is a low-power product, it can work normally in most cases. But when the source power is not enough, the converter may work in abnormal condition, the display picture may be flicker, In this condition, please connect the USB cable from the convert mini USB port to source or display equipment USB port for Power in.
1 x VGA to AV Convertor 1 x USB Cable *Power Adapter not included
